cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 0 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: 12 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A sleek and modern 12-bed ensuite dorm with privacy curtains and charging ports, designed for comfort and style.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A spacious 6-bed shared suite with ensuite, featuring modern furnishings and a private bathroom. Enjoy added comfort with privacy curtains and charging ports on every bunk.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable

dorms.labelDescription: A 4-bed shared suite with an ensuite, providing a spacious and private setting for a relaxing stay. Privacy curtains and charging ports are included with each bunk for extra convenience.

privates.name: Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: A private queen room with ensuite, designed for ultimate comfort and convenience, offering a perfect space for a peaceful stay with all the essentials.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 5th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 5th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
